name: Superhero Adventure - Hulk Version
description:
Superhero Adventure - Hulk Version is a FREE retro action platformer adventure game!

Entertaining gameplay, hours of fun guaranteed!

Find the key to unlock next level, avoid enemies and obstacles and find your way out!

Get through all 24 rooms to complete the game - but be careful - it is not as easy as it looks!

Help the green Hulk to jump up and down with just an easy touch.

Get bonus points by collecting coins. Get ranked in leaderboard.

Superhero Adventure - Hulk Version is waiting for you - download now and share with friends!
